channel.title: ★ OS-Virtue 2.0 - Need Staff || Shamans || Fullscreen || Abby Sire || 24/7 ★
channel.description:
[CENTER] [img]http://osvirtue.org/img/logo.png[/img] [SIZE=5][url=http://osvirtue.org/][B]Home[/B][/url] - [url=http://legacy07.com/community/][B]Forums[/B][/url] - [url=http://osvirtue.org/OSVClient2.jar][B]Play Now[/B][/url] - [url=http://osvirtue.org/highscores//][B]Highscores[/B][/url] - [url=http://rsps-pay.com/store.php?id=2930&tab=2471][B]Store[/B][/url] [/SIZE]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DCJ5zXc.jpg[/img]
credits: OS VIRTUE
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/To0IwOh.png[/img] 30+ Online || 24/7 Uptime || Zulrah || Corp || [/center] [center]
Owners Note: Here at OS-Virtue we strive to give the player the best PvM, Economy, and PvP RSPS experience in a great OSRS based environment. We have a great active community with hundreds of players registered and great PvM content like Lizard Man Shamans, Cerberus, Zulrah, Abyssal Sire, and all of the new Slayer monsters! OS-Virtue also has up to date OSRS maps and data to provide the ultimate OSRS experience! Nonetheless, the economy is the main focus in OS-Virtue, with all the regulations and an excellent plan has OS-Virtue 2.0 on a path to become a great OSRS server for years to come! OS-Virtue also has auto-donate, auto-vote, and high-scores systems to help players improve the server and themselves competitively! So why not give it a go? Join today at www.OSVirtue.org today!
Removed donation link due to rules.[/center]

item.dc:creator: @rin_okumura rin okumura
item.description:
@rin_okumura wrote:

[quote=“Legacy07, post:31, topic:554328”][quote author=khayam link=topic=673254.msg4506049#msg4506049 date=1458805236]
looks like a full copy of rin okumura’s dragon-age source, atleast have the decency to give him credits and stop bumping this shit server constantly.
[/quote]

Shit server? Kid you haven’t even been in game plus your an idiot. Does rin okumura have #108 data? Also does he have all the new #108 items coded in properly with there respective bosses (Cerb, Sire, Lizardman)? No he doesn’t. So why don’t you back up out of here before you look like a bigger idiot.[/quote]

Uhhhh Yes I do own 108 data and all those combat scripts derp. Talk shit for no reason much.

Read full topic

item.title: ★ OS-Virtue 2.0 - Need Staff || Shamans || Fullscreen || Abby Sire || 24/7 ★
item.dc:creator: @CSharp95 CSharp95
item.description:
@CSharp95 wrote:

After playing the server for about a month, it’s time to write a quick review.

First off, the server is fun. There’s enough content to keep you busy for quite a while, the experience rates are acceptable and a new boss is getting added in every now and again to keep the pvm ball rolling.
But that’s about all there is.

I’m not too sure how I feel about the developer considering there were many, many, many bugs that needed fixing that the community would consistently ask to be fixed and they still haven’t been and probably never will be. He also tends to choose staff that have a bit of a temper to them seeing how I was forced to quit by one who kept deleting a couple threads I made simply because he didn’t like my ideas.
There’s also a refusal to attempt developing much original content because “it might introduce bugs” no matter how much the community might want it.

All in all, it’s worth a try like many servers are, but don’t expect it to advance any beyond how it currently is, and don’t offer any feedback that isn’t “holy shit this server makes my dick hard guise :D” because I promise the staff will shoot you down pretty quick for committing wrongthink.

Read full topic
item.source: ★ OS-Virtue 2.0 - Need Staff || Shamans || Fullscreen || Abby Sire || 24/7 ★
